alert.note: Alert for Coastal Chatham; Effingham; Inland Bryan; Inland Chatham (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF BRYAN, EFFINGHAM AND CHATHAM COUNTIES... At 645 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Bloomingdale, or near Godley Station, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...strong winds 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar Indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Some locations in the path of this storm include... Pooler, Richmond Hill, I-16/I-95 Interchange, Hunter Army Airfield, Downtown Savannah, Godley Station, Savannah International Airport, and Windsor Forest. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Excessive cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 15 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Chatham; Effingham; Inland Bryan; Inland Chatham
